Calculation¶

namespace: VoldeNuit.Framework.Calculation

public static class Calculation

Static Methods¶


point_direction(float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2)¶

Returns angle between two points.

Note: VoldeNuit provides three ways to express angles; radians, degrees, and legacy. The default is radians.
For more information, see Configuration.ANGLE_FORMAT.

  • Returns: float (angle from (x1, y1) to (x2, y2).)

Parameter

Type

Desc

x1

float

x position of start point.

y1

float

y position of start point.

x2

float

x position of end point.

y2

float

y position of end point.

 
public static float point_direction(float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2) {}

point_distance(float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2)¶

Returns distance between two points.

  • Returns: float (distance.)

Parameter

Type

Desc

x1

float

x position of first point.

y1

float

y position of first point.

x2

float

x position of second point.

y2

float

y position of second point.

 
public static float point_distance(float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2) {}

radian_to_legacy(float radian)¶

Converts radian to Legacy type and returns it.

  • Returns: float (Legacy type angle.)

Parameter

Type

Desc

radian

float

radian to convert.

 
public static float radian_to_legacy(float radian) {}

legacy_to_radian(float degree)¶

Converts Legacy type to radian returns it.

  • Returns: float (radian.)

Parameter

Type

Desc

degree

float

legacy type degree to convert.

 
public static float legacy_to_radian(float degree) {}
